actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to require Federal firearms licensees to provide such firearms record information as may be necessary to aid in the tracing of firearms in the course of a law enforcement investigation.

summary.text: Firearms Tracing Assistance Act of 1992 - Amends the Federal criminal code to require Federal firearms licensees to provide all record information required under the code or by the Secretary of the Treasury as may be necessary for determining the disposition of a firearm in a law enforcement investigation. Exempts violators of such provision from criminal penalties.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to require Federal firearms licensees to provide such firearms record information as may be necessary to aid in the tracing of firearms in the course of a law enforcement investigation.
